TopicTitle: Why the heck aren't there bigger/smaller/shorter/longer versions of these:

Articles.Content:
http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Structural_Fuselage

Given the lack of functional parts for space stations (beyond heavy fuel tanks, docking ports and solar arrays), a handful of various-sized/shaped fuselages would go a long way in giving us more cosmetic building options.

Yeah, some more parts that kerbals can supposedly pass through would be nice. Because those are so light, I'll usually stick 2-3 onto my station per launch. Some windows on the sides would be cool too.

Stations in general need more of a scientific purpose (other than refueling)
